div.div: NO, IT HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SATAN

div.a: The Science Of Sinkholes: What You Should Know

div.div: A Tampa man died Thursday when a sinkhole suddenly swallowed his entire bedroom and pulled it deep into the earth. But what exactly is a sinkhole and how do they happen?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WmAUg5&via=Digg&text=The Science Of Sinkholes: What You Should Know

div.a: Thousands Of Illegal Immigrants Released

div.div: The Homeland Security Department released from its jails more than 2,000 illegal immigrants facing deportation in recent weeks due to looming budget cuts and planned to release 3,000 more during March.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XfU85E&via=Digg&text=Thousands Of Illegal Immigrants Released

div.div: HOW HEROKU IS LIKE RODNEY DANGERFIELD

div.a: Rap Genius Responds To Heroku's Call For 'Respect' Amid Allegations Of Fraud

div.div: We shouldn’t have to start a media shitstorm just to get Heroku to admit what’s really going on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WzbFlz&via=Digg&text=Rap Genius Responds To Heroku's Call For 'Respect' Amid Allegations Of Fraud

div.a: Iceland Tests Find Meat Pies Don't Contain Horse Meat – Or Any Meat

div.div: Checking for horsemeat, food authorities get a strange surprise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WlIXd3&via=Digg&text=Iceland Tests Find Meat Pies Don't Contain Horse Meat – Or Any Meat

div.div: WROTE 'GREEN EGGS AND HAM' ON A BET

div.a: Happy Birthday, Dr. Seuss! 9 Ways He Was A Secret Bad-Ass

div.div: Today marks what would have been the 109th birthday of legendary children's author Dr. Seuss, aka. Theodor Geisel.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wzdqzb&via=Digg&text=Happy Birthday, Dr. Seuss! 9 Ways He Was A Secret Bad-Ass

div.a: Wading Into The World Of Online Dating In China

div.div: It was flattering but not altogether too surprising that within minutes of activating my profile, my inbox was flooded with messages. The first came from a 26-year-old, O-type, triangle-faced man named “Poisonsc…” But as I browsed through his profile, alarm bells quickly went off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5JeuP&via=Digg&text=Wading Into The World Of Online Dating In China

div.div: NO STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS ON MURDER

div.a: Woman's Death From A 30-Year-Old Bullet Wound Ruled A Homicide

div.div: In 1982, Linda J. Knauss was shot in a holdup outside a boutique in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. This past week, she passed away due to complications from that old wound. That means that 30 years after being shot, Knauss perished as the result of a homicide.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wz5Zrw&via=Digg&text=Woman's Death From A 30-Year-Old Bullet Wound Ruled A Homicide

div.a: Watch This Bartending Robot Pee Ingredients Into The Perfect Cocktail

div.div: It's one thing to have a robot make drinks for you. It's another to have a robot make drinks for you in style.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZUK1Wk&via=Digg&text=Watch This Bartending Robot Pee Ingredients Into The Perfect Cocktail

div.div: SHARK WEEK TO BE REDUCED TO A SINGLE DAY

div.a: Don't Fear Sharks – Soon They Won't Exist

div.div: Almost 100 million sharks are being killed each year, with fishing rates outstripping the ability of populations to recover, scientists have estimated.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YSuAvi&via=Digg&text=Don't Fear Sharks – Soon They Won't Exist

div.a: This Man Is An Expert At Creeping People Out On Facebook

div.div: First, he searches Facebook for people with the same name as his. Once he finds his unsuspecting target, he replicates the person’s profile picture He then sends the person a friend request rocking their knockoff profile pic.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3fEHg&via=Digg&text=This Man Is An Expert At Creeping People Out On Facebook

div.a: Boris The Polar Bear Gets A Root Canal

div.div: While a trip to the dentist is nobody’s idea of fun, even the person holding the drill gets nervous when the patient is a 900 lb. polar bear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15noF3i&via=Digg&text=Boris The Polar Bear Gets A Root Canal

div.a: A Brief History Of Hollywood's Breast Anxiety

div.div: Too much of the American movie audience assumes that sex on screen is for voyeurs and dirty jokers. Yet there was a time, the late ’30s and early ’40s, when sex was seen as important, often amusing and for adults. Which is not the same as Adult.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRwcp1&via=Digg&text=A Brief History Of Hollywood's Breast Anxiety

div.a: The All-Stars Of David

div.div: In the great Jewish tradition, 43 members of the tribe descended on Southern Florida. But instead of playing canasta, they dreamed of victory on the diamond. With names like Greenberg, Lipetz, and Fish, they united in the hopes of bringing glory to the Holy Land in this month's World Baseball Classic.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13tZcH2&via=Digg&text=The All-Stars Of David

div.a: Great Moments In Rappers Performing At Bar Mitzvah Parties

div.div: At least until very recently, rappers performing at lavish Bar Mitzvahs was one of those weirdly unspoken taboos of rap: An incredibly lucrative way to make quick, easy money, that nobody wanted to talk about, let alone have evidence of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13wZtZS&via=Digg&text=Great Moments In Rappers Performing At Bar Mitzvah Parties

div.a: Jay Leno's Days Hosting 'Tonight' Are Numbered

div.div: Let's not mince words here: if this happens, it's because Leno is being pushed out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15YGsiB&via=Digg&text=Jay Leno's Days Hosting 'Tonight' Are Numbered

div.a: In Depressed Spain, ATMs That Dispense Free Cash

div.div: People in Spain thought it was a joke — or a fraud — when a video popped up on YouTube showing what looks like a normal ATM, offering 100 euros ($131) for free — without a bank card. It seemed too good to be true.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3EsjH&via=Digg&text=In Depressed Spain, ATMs That Dispense Free Cash

div.a: Russia’s Magician Murders

div.div: Young models went to Gosha the Wizard seeking success, love, and fortune—and three of them may have lost their lives in the process.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wmws0J&via=Digg&text=Russia’s Magician Murders

div.a: The 1950s' Most Nauseating Jell-O Soaked Recipes

div.div: Unlike the menus on contemporary food blogs and in best-selling recipe books, mid-century cooking seems guaranteed to make you gag, thanks to its mismatched flavors, industrial ingredients, and gelatin overload.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YypH6r&via=Digg&text=The 1950s' Most Nauseating Jell-O Soaked Recipes

div.a: The Holocaust Just Got More Shocking

div.div: Thirteen years ago, researchers at the Holocaust Memorial Museum began the grim task of documenting all the ghettos, slave labor sites, concentration camps that the Nazis set up throughout Europe. What they have found so far has shocked even scholars steeped in the history of the Holocaust.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y4UPdP&via=Digg&text=The Holocaust Just Got More Shocking

div.a: You Can't Help Loving Tech Companies — They're Designed That Way

div.div: Tech scored a trifecta this week, polishing its reputation as the world’s best-loved industry by taking the top three spots on Fortune’s annual list of most admired companies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12fSfd3&via=Digg&text=You Can't Help Loving Tech Companies — They're Designed That Way

div.div: REMINDS YOU TO CHANGE YOUR PASSWORD

div.a: Evernote Got Hacked

div.div: Company behind application used by about 50 million people says some user data was accessed, and it requires all users to reset passwords.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XxbmtG&via=Digg&text=Evernote Got Hacked

div.div: OUR BEST IDEAS ARE TAYLOR SWIFT SONGS

div.a: Science Explains Why Our Best Ideas Come In The Shower

div.div: Ever wonder why some of your best ideas seem to come out of the blue (while you're in the shower, for example)? Creativity, while seemingly a very vague activity, is actually a distinct process triggered by a few key factors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YOE8Ht&via=Digg&text=Science Explains Why Our Best Ideas Come In The Shower

div.a: You Can Reach Into This Monitor And Touch The Interface

div.div: What is you could reach right into your OS but still have all the lazy convenience of using a trackpad?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/149mC0k&via=Digg&text=You Can Reach Into This Monitor And Touch The Interface

div.a: MTA's New Tactic In Rat War: Rodent Birth Control

div.div: Locked in endless struggle with the rodents that infest the subway, transit officials have tried poison and deadly traps. They've blocked rat-size pathways into tempting trash rooms and removed garbage cans from platforms. Now, they're ready to try birth control.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZKnVlB&via=Digg&text=MTA's New Tactic In Rat War: Rodent Birth Control

div.a: What Coke Contains

div.div: The number of individuals who know how to make a can of Coke is zero. The number of individual nations that could produce a can of Coke is zero. This famously American product is not American at all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13mbT6I&via=Digg&text=What Coke Contains

div.div: HE'S A BIG HUGH JACKMAN FAN

div.a: Rupert Murdoch Is On Tumblr, And The Photos Are Kind Of Amazing

div.div: It’s an intimate, if selective, look at the 82-year-old media baron as he travels to New York, Washington, London, Sydney, and other cities.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z7PK6x&via=Digg&text=Rupert Murdoch Is On Tumblr, And The Photos Are Kind Of Amazing

div.a: The Top Ten Most Controversial Action Figures Of The Modern Era

div.div: The recent kerfuffle over NECA's Django Unchained figures is just the latest in a long line of controversies surrounding little plastic people. Action figures have been causing controversies almost as long as they've been around.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZHy7eK&via=Digg&text=The Top Ten Most Controversial Action Figures Of The Modern Era

div.a: Is Internet Addiction Real?

div.div: Are we addicted to this series of tubes? With sites like Facebook, twitter, google, wikipedia and Reddit our day’s time can slip away in an instant.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZVa5AT&via=Digg&text=Is Internet Addiction Real?

div.div: CAN'T FIND THEM IN HIS HOUSE

div.a: 'Hoarder' With Top Security Clearance Admits To Removing Classified Papers

div.div: A U.S. intelligence analyst who held a top-secret security clearance and described himself as a “hoarder” has pleaded guilty to illegally removing confidential documents from his government office and storing them in his car and home, which FBI agents found strewn with similar sensitive material.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XLEN9h&via=Digg&text='Hoarder' With Top Security Clearance Admits To Removing Classified Papers

div.a: The Fishy History Of The McDonald’s Filet-O-Fish Sandwich

div.div: How a struggling entrepreneur in Ohio saved his burger business during Lent and changed the McDonald's menu for good.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YOlv6t&via=Digg&text=The Fishy History Of The McDonald’s Filet-O-Fish Sandwich
